channel.title: How to get coords? Help!
channel.description: Hi i want to run my server with (its with client) and i want to make a shop but dont know how to check coords..... They are not show in emotes or something plz help! is there a command or something?

item.title: How to get coords? Help!
item.dc:creator: @WiseMen WiseMen
item.description:
@WiseMen wrote:

filipszycha:

Hi i want to run my server with (its with client) and i want to make a shop but dont know how to check coords… They are not show in emotes or something plz help! is there a command or something?

First time poster, obviously leeching a source. If you cannot find out a simple command or know nothing about RSPS. Most private servers have ::mypos in them, unless the creator or coder deletes them.

Btw what source you using?

Read full topic

item.title: How to get coords? Help!
item.dc:creator: @ameer122 ameer122
item.description:
@ameer122 wrote:

its ::mypos

if its dont work go into your client in soruce

and add this anywhere

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Read full topic

item.title: How to get coords? Help!
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

try
::mypos

if not,log out then go char files and chek it under your char files

Read full topic
